message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a one-of-a-kind item that I think you'll really love.
Thank you for offering me the product, Alice. I appreciate the excitement around it. I'd like to propose a price of $120 for the product.
Thank you for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your interest in the product. After reconsidering, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'll offer the product to you for $135.
Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. I appreciate the effort. I would like to counter with a price of $125 for the product.
Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I'm still willing to negotiate, but I need to make sure I get a fair price for the product. I'll offer it to you for $130.
I understand your position, Alice. I'd like to propose a price of $127 for the product.
Thank you for your offer, Bob. I'm getting close to your price, but I still need to make sure I get a good deal. I'll offer it to you for $129.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. I would like to counter with a price of $128 for the product.
Thank you for your offer, Bob. I'm getting close to your price, and I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'll offer it to you for $129.50.
I appreciate your efforts, Alice. Considering the negotiations, I would like to propose a final price of $129 for the product.
